titles.title: A concurrent resolution commending the Republic of Korea in hosting the Games of the XXIV Olympiad, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.
Senate Committee on Foreign Relations discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary: 10/4/1988--Introduced. Salutes the Republic of Korea for successfully hosting the XXIV Olympiad. Expresses the appreciation of the American people for the warmth, generosity, and hospitality extended by the people of Korea.
